long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI-Powered, One-Click CV Optimizer 

Vocatio is a unique extension designed to create resumes that precisely match job descriptions.

With just a single click, it crafts a resume, eliminating the need for manual text copying and pasting. Each resume is skillfully reworded from your existing one, infused with relevant keywords, skills, and tools, thanks to the innovative use of Gemini AI. This approach ensures your resume stands out for each specific job. Plus, our Reviewer Mode in the web app allows you to compare the original and the generated versions side-by-side. If the initial version doesn't quite hit the mark, our variety of designs and tools are at your disposal to make those essential fine-tuning adjustments.

Our Inspiration: We empathize with anyone who finds customizing a resume for each job application a daunting, time-consuming task. However, the advantage of a personalized resume over a generic one is undeniable in standing out among applicants. That's where Vocatio comes in, transforming hours of effort into a mere 5-minute task.

✨ Key Features:

• Company-Specific Resumes: Create tailored resumes with just one click.
• Cover Letters: Effortlessly generate personalized cover letters.
• Auto CV optimization: follow the best practices for composing a CV with no effort.
• CV Editor & AI-Enhanced Tools: Shorten text, convert to bullet points, condense to 1-2 pages, rephrase, apply custom commands, and more.
• Skill Rearrangement: Automatically organize your skills by relevance.
• Relevance Optimization: Detail your employment history as extensively as you like. Our AI will filter out the essentials for each job. Write it thoroughly once, and never worry about it again.
• Job Tracker: Manage your job applications with a personalized dashboard. Organize, sort, filter, and search by various criteria to keep your job hunt streamlined.
• Plus, automatic CV translation to the language of the job posting, and more!

Experience the full range of features during our completely free beta!
How can you thank us? Spread the word!
